name: Evelyn
description:
The crops are dying and you're the only one who can save what remains of the world... aren't you?

Your name is Evelyn, and you were chosen at birth to save the commune of Moil, marked by the veil over your face when you were born. Of course, you were never told all of this until the very day you're supposed to actually be a savior. Which is today.

Play through this Bitsy RPG, in which your only goal is to sacrifice yourself to the beast Curglaft, to appease his hunger and save your commune. Ignore any locked doors, winding hallways, and keys, of course, they'll only distract you...

cw: passing mentions of sexual assault, incest, suicidal ideation, and slavery; lesbophobia; cults; gun violence and death

-----------

This is the first game I've ever done,  Bitsy or otherwise, so I'm hoping you all will like it! Please let me know ASAP if there are any bugs/errors, as well as if you think anything else warrants a content warning here in the description. I want to give a huge thanks to everyone in the Bitsy Discord, especially Sean for all his help with the hacking, as well as my lovely friends/beta testers!
